public class StringUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Contains some methods for string manipulation.

Method Detail

containsIllegalChars

public static boolean containsIllegalChars(java.lang.String text)
Checks if a string contains illegal characters with respect to the XML specification.

Parameters:
text - the text to be checked
Returns:
true if illegal chars contained, otherwise false

doubleToString

public static java.lang.String doubleToString(double d)
Converts a double to a string. The default rounding precision is used.

Parameters:
d - double to be converted
Returns:
a string representing the passed double value

doubleToString

public static java.lang.String doubleToString(double d,
                                              int precision)
Converts a double to a string. You can specify the rounding precision, i.e. the number of digits after the decimal point.

Parameters:
d - double to be converted
precision - rounding precision
Returns:
a string representing the passed double value

purgeString

public static java.lang.String purgeString(java.lang.String text)
Cleans strings of illegal characters with respect to the XML specification.

Parameters:
text - string to be cleaned
Returns:
the cleaned string
